resources.string: We are very happy to have you here, before we continue and after detecting that you are new, we would like to tell you a little bit about what is Food & Service and why you will love it!
Order in any restaurant in the world, in your own language, check allergens and intolerances and pay directly from your mobile with the payment method that is most convenient for you.
You can place your order at any time without waiting to be served, order what you want and pay, you only have to worry about enjoying your meal.
Our restaurants are always giving discounts to their customers through Food & Service, whenever we can we will show you the best discounts!

We request the the following Contacts (To get your number on the sign up process), Messaging (To automatically validate the SMS code) and Notifications (To notify you of the latest discounts and promotions).
We have sent you an SMS to your phone, please enter the code below
Welcome to Food & Service, to finish we need your full name. This will be visible to other users when you interact.
